Articles.Content: i can't find a way to use phiscal warp (1x,2x,3x,4x,) after i escaped the atmosveer. this on the xbox one (X)
Same issue, makes the game unplayable beyond Mun and Minmus trips. Who has the time to perform a 30 minute to hour long burn in real time?

I'm surprised none of the devs have commented on this. 

Seems this function might be missing/ been overlooked.
